department.en: MSc in Hydrologocal and  Oceanic Sciences
department.ch: 水文與海洋科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: “The purpose of this course is to build the capacity of students (1) to understand the basis of environmental systems analysis, (2) to transform the problems related to environmental management into mathametical programming models, (3) to apply different methods to solve the mathametical programming models, and (4) to analyze the results of optimal solutions and assist decision making.“
goal.ch: 本課程之目標為使修課學生(1)具備環境系統分析基本概念、(2)具備轉換環境管理問題為數理規劃模式之能力、(3)能應用不同優化方法求解數理規劃模式、(4)能分析求解結果並提供作為協助決策之資訊

content.en: “This course starts with the introduction of the basis, problems, and applications of environmental systems analysis in environmental management, followed by the methods of optimization and simulation. The optimization methods include linear programming, sensitivity analysis and duality, integer programming, and dynamic programming. The simulation methods include tabu search algorithm, simmulated annealing algorithm, and genetic algorithm.“
content.ch: 本課程首先介紹環境系統分析於環境管理之概念與問題應用，接著分別介紹最佳化方法(optimization)與模擬優選方法(simulation)；其中最佳化方法包含線性規劃、敏感度分析與對偶理論、整數規劃、動態規劃，模擬優選方法包含禁忌演算法、模擬退火演算法、遺傳演算法。

textbook.en: “童慶斌，「環境系統分析」講義，台灣大學，生物環境系統工程學系。 Haith, D.A., Environmental System Analysis. Chang, Ni-bin, Systems Analysis for Sustainable Engineering: Theory and Applications Glover, F. and M. Laguna, 1997. Tabu Search. Kluwer Academic Publishers, Boston, MA, USA. Goldberg, D. E. 1989. Genetic Algorithms in Search, Optimization, and Machine Learning. Addison-Wesley Publishing Company, Inc, Reading, MA, USA. Loucks, Daniel P. and van Beek, Eelco, ““Water Resource Systems Planning and Management: An Introduction to Methods, Models, and Applications““.“
